title: ICE "Or-pattern should have been expanded earlier on"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
### Code

This code is reduced from issue-54538-unused-parens-lint.rs

```rust
#![feature(or_patterns)]

fn main() {
    if let 0 | (1 | 2) = 0 {}
}
```

### Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.43.0-nightly (564758c4c 2020-03-08)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 564758c4c329e89722454dd2fbb35f1ac0b8b47c
commit-date: 2020-03-08
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.43.0-nightly
LLVM version: 9.0

clippy 0.0.212 (329923e 2020-03-04)
```

### Error output

```
warning: unnecessary parentheses around pattern
 --> ./ui/lint/issue-54538-unused-parens-lint.rs:3:16
  |
3 |     if let 0 | (1 | 2) = 0 {}
  |                ^^^^^^^ help: remove these parentheses
  |
  = note: `#[warn(unused_parens)]` on by default

error: internal compiler error: src/librustc_mir_build/hair/pattern/_match.rs:1884: Or-pattern should have been expanded earlier on.

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:875:9
```
